about.title: Who Am I ?
about.description2: , and I am also learning to become a
about.description3: I am proud to be an IT student at DUT, and I was fortunate to find an internship in my second year of university. This opportunity allowed me to learn, challenge myself, and grow my skills.
about.description4: I am deeply grateful to the mentors who have devoted their time to help me develop and refine myself.
about.description5: I am continually striving to improve and I share everything I know with complete sincerity, hoping to help others in some way.
about.description6: Also, this place is where I write down my knowledge, personal experiences, and various stories. If you're interested, feel free to drop by and check out my blog—looking forward to seeing you here!

home.title: My Space - Hoàng Xơn
home.description: A little corner for my soul, where I share all stupid things of my life.

about.title: About me - Hoàng Xơn
about.description: Discover more about me on this page dedicated to sharing my personal story.
